name: Lost in Island
description:
Aim high scores and get to the top of the Ranks, as well as World Ranking!
A Simple game that's perfect to play whenever you have a minute!

[How to play]

Touch the screen and lengthen a stick.
Lift a finger when stick length is enough to reach next island.
Stick will fall.
Chalk Men will move one to the next island.

Find your way to home through 100 islands use palm trees to build a bridge to escape from the island.
Beware to underestimate the bamboo bridge length, if u miss stickman will fall to sea full of bloody sharks.
